name: Find your friend in the city
name_original: Find your friend in the city
description:
"Find your Friend in the City" is an original cooperative game where two players play together in one large city. 

Their player objective is to find each other before a time limit runs out. 

The main way they do this is by orienteering and guiding one another through the map, using visual landmarks to coordinate together.

We consider the characteristics of this game are able to submit to contest Human human AMAZE for be:

-    Original.

-    Local multiplayer game.

-    Mechanic of orientation proposal. 

          The players should participate in active form saying giving information about were they are and what they see. they should pay attention to shapes and colors.

-   Outstandig social interaccion.

          The social interaction in the players is inevitable if they want win.

 

Characteristics, for play this game you should have:

-   Orientation.
-   Global view.
-   Not too much claustrophobia!

   Controls:
                  -   Player_one left arrow (move left), right arrow (move right), space bar(Jump).
                  -   Player_Two a (move left), d (move right), f (Jump).

Design: Ramiro de la Lastra, Jaime Hebrero. Art: Jaime Hebrero, Ramiro de la Lastra .
